title: Client issues
body: I opened the LoL launcher today and clicked Launch, the button went grey as it does, but that only lasted for about a second and the login screen did not show up. I have absolutely no idea what the problem is, I used the hextech repair tool to uninstall and reinstall the game, forced a repatch, still didnt work. Then did the "clean" uninstall and reinstall, but didnt force a repatch. The launcher doesnt seem to be patching itself after it finished installing again. I cannot run the repair tool either, I click on it and nothing happens.

replies.body:
This issue specifically happens if your connection to the login servers is *really unstable*. Common reasons for this are either problematic local network settings or issues along your network routing. As your next step, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings work with League.

Let me know if this helped.

Thank you for the advice, I managed to get it to work through other means. Another rioter linked me to your permissions guide, so I did a few things from there and got it working again. Thanks anyway!
